attributes.action: do something about tory bias reporting at BBC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am fed up complaining to the BBC about the above.  The fact is Thompson is the Fred the Shred at the BBC.  No way should he be earning more than the PM.  We are not getting non bias reporting.  Nick Robinson is an ex Tory supporter at his university and David Dimbelby is an ex member of the same champagne club as the Tories.  Andrew Neill is probably still being paid by Murdoch.  And the BBC say they are impartial.  They do not no the meaning of the word.  I blame producers and editors.  All of this at our expense.  We are not getting a good service.  We need a clearout at the BBC.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
